title: Discord: Listado de datos (5 pasos)
description: This n8n workflow uses 5 interconnected nodes to automate business processes. When triggered, it executes a sequence of operations that connect different business systems. Streamlines business operations by automating repetitive tasks and ensuring consistent data flow.

title: Webhook: Recepción de webhook (4 pasos)
description: This n8n workflow uses 4 interconnected nodes to automate business processes. When triggered, it executes a sequence of operations that connect different business systems. Streamlines business operations by automating repetitive tasks.
